A fellow I know has a car He delivers the Teddy bears
Colonel, I have a more important problem on my hands... one of our teddy bears is missing.
But, as plentiful as are the bear so the women are scarce.
- Yes, those bears are very popular...
And contrary to what everybody hears, bears are dangerous.
You see, I was coming home with great presents, when I was surrounded by a band of... bears and Indians.
Always thought there was nothing but grizzlies and Indians out here, but I swear I've never seen so many beautiful women.
When I was 15, I went to bear hunting with dad. When coming back, I killed him here.
I'm taking the Bears, I can't quit on them.
I can see you've really come To hunt bear, haven't you?
